revised_title: Geometrical Phase Factors in Adiabatic Changes
tldr: The author explains the concept of geometrical phase factors that accompany adiabatic changes in quantum systems. They derive a formula for this phase factor in terms of the eigenstates of the system's Hamiltonian and show that it contains a circuit-dependent component. The author also demonstrates how this phase factor can be used to understand the Aharonov-Bohm effect and the sign change of spinors in slowly-rotated magnetic fields.
